Class StudentDataManagerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • StudentDataManagerTest

  • public class StudentDataManagerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This is to be used with the following data files: customers.txt and orders.txt. These are semicolon separated field files, or you can create these data files in Notepad:

    customers.txt:

    Katniss;Everdeen;86 Hopeless Dr, The Seam;23.56;

    Peeta;Mellark;215 Main St, Town Square;217.45;

    Gale;Hawthorne;724 Despair Ct, The Seam;111.33;

    Haymitch;Abernathy;32 Winners Row, Victor's Village;836.23;

    Coriolanus;Snow;President's Mansion, The Capitol;2469.21;

    Effie;Trinket;654 High Society Blvd, The Capitol;1828.52;

    orders.txt:

    103;54.77;

    105;369.33;

    106;865.29;

    104;974.19;

    Author:
    JMYERS modified by Adam Holt

      • oneTimeSetUp

        public static void oneTimeSetUp()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to choose the customers.txt and orders.txt, before any test are run. Only need to be selected once no matter how many tests are to be run
